item.title: How to Drink Wine
item.author: ssphugo@srkn.anonaddy.com (Srikanth Perinkulam)
item.description:
Wine is pleasure and conviviality, it is culture and it makes food taste better. But wine can also be intimidating. This guide takes the anxiety out of shopping, buying and drinking wine.

Source: How to Drink Wine
